Evaluate an expression with meta mode activated

Source: R/metareactive.R
withMetaMode.Rd

Evaluate an expression with meta mode activated

withMetaMode(expr, mode = TRUE)

Arguments

expr

an expression.
mode

whether or not to evaluate expression in meta mode.

Value

The result of evaluating expr.

See also

expandChain()
